name: Guns n' Rustlers
description:
Western-futuristic shooting game. Test your accuracy in the shooting range, or against an AI enemy cowboy.

Two game modes

  • Shooting range: Score as many points as possible by shooting every can and target on the stage, in a race against the clock.
  • Duel: Compete against an increasingly difficult AI for the title of the fastest gun in the West !

-Requires VR hardware-

This game is the result of a semester assignment, for the "Video games development 1" course, from the ORT University (Montevideo, Uruguay). 

It was our first and only experience with VR games development yet, so it may not get the "Best Game of the Year" Award. ;)

It's polished enough to be published, but it has a lot of room for improvement. Feel free to give us feedback on what works (or doesn't) for you.

Thanks for playing, HAVE FUN !!!
